name: C. Success Rate
statement:
You are an experienced Codeforces user. Today you found out that during
your activity on Codeforces you have made submissions, out of which have
been successful. Thus, your current success rate on Codeforces is equal
to .Your favorite rational number in the range is . Now you wonder: what
is the smallest number of submissions you have to make if you want your
success rate to be ?
